name: Coin shooter (MaxxBurn)
description:
Hey,

This is my third game ever made, and it's the first one i decided to publish. The game is a simple Shooter game.

You have a crosshair and you need to shoot coins flying in the map. Each coin gives different effect. There are currently 6 coins.

■ Coin - 5 points

■ Blue Coin - 2 points

■ Yellow Coin- 1 point

■ Red Coin - Lose 5 points

■ Shield Coin -  On click - Takes 5 clicks to clear and gives 10 points
Not clicked disappear - lose 5 points

■ Target Coin - On click - 0 points and The next 5 objects to appear are coins. Not clicked disappear - lose 10 points

However because i was lacking assets all the coins look the same :P. You could say it increases the difficulty by a bit.

Upon getting 120 points you win the game, if the timer runs out you lose and the game restarts. You also have 120 seconds to win.

I hope you enjoy playing it.
